basics.name: Griffin Rodgers
basics.label: Systems Engineer
basics.summary: IT Professional with a focus on automation and process improvement. Certified Jamf Associate with hands on experience managing 100+ Corporate Macs through Jamf. Senior Computer Engineering Undergraduate at the University of Utah.

work.name: Berkadia Commercial Mortgage
highlights: Implemented Azure Virtual Desktop to replace aging Remote Desktop Services infrastructure netting a 90% decrease in log in/out times and 70% decrease in server footprint in on-premises data center.
Re-architected the Jamf Cloud management system to manage over 100 MacBooks in the US & India, including a zero-touch deployment system that reduced deployment time by 20 minutes on average.

Deployed Android Enterprise device management for personally owned devices through Microsoft Intune & Endpoint Manager to 1000+ mobile devices, as well as re-architected personal iOS device management in Intune, improving our compliance and security posture.
Created 30+ pages of documentation on support processes for the Service Desk, reducing escalations by nearly 30%.
